verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* himself with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w*, which \add was\add* over the \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w Shebna|strong="H7644"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, to \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, and of \w rebuke|strong="H8433"\w*, and \w blasphemy|strong="H5007"\w*: for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w birth|strong="H4866"\w*, and \add there is\add* not \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* to bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*.\f + \fr 19.3 \ft blasphemy: or, provocation\f*

It may \w be|strong="H0194"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and will \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*: wherefore lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \add thy\add* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* for the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* that are \w left|strong="H4672"\w*.  +  r 19.4  t left: Heb. found *
So the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*.

¶ And \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to your \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, with which the \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* have \w blasphemed|strong="H1442"\w* me.

Behold, I will \w send|strong="H5414"\w* a \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* upon him, and he shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* a \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w*, and shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and I will cause him to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in his own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ So \w Rab-shakeh|strong="H7262"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w warring|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*: for he had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that he was \w departed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*.

And when he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of \w Tirhakah|strong="H8640"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, Behold, he is come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against thee: he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus shall ye \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let not thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in whom thou \w trustest|strong="H0982"\w* \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall not be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

Behold, thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* what the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to all \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, by destroying them \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w*: and shalt thou be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*?

Have the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them which my \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w*; \add as\add* \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w*, and \w Haran|strong="H2771"\w*, and \w Rezeph|strong="H7530"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5729"\w* which \add were\add* in \w Thelasar|strong="H8515"\w*?

Where \add is\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Arpad|strong="H0774"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*, of \w Hena|strong="H2012"\w*, and \w Ivah|strong="H5755"\w*?

¶ And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* the \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it: and \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, thou art the \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* thou alone, of all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, bow \w down|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: \w open|strong="H6491"\w*, 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*: and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w*, which hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him to \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Of a \w truth|strong="H0551"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* have \w destroyed|strong="H2717"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and their \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*,

And have \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* into the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: for they \add were\add* no \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, but the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*: therefore they have \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* them.\f + \fr 19.18 \ft cast: Heb. given\f*

Now therefore, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I beseech thee, \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thou us out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \add art\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* thou only.

¶ Then \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add That\add* which thou hast \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* to me against \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* concerning him; The \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* hath \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* thee, \add and\add* laughed thee to \w scorn|strong="H3932"\w*; the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* hath \w shaken|strong="H5128"\w* her \w head|strong="H7218"\w* at \w thee|strong="H0310"\w*.

Whom hast thou \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* and \w blasphemed|strong="H1442"\w*? and against whom hast thou \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \add thy\add* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*? \add even\add* against the \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \add One\add* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* thou hast \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, and hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, With the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of my \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* I am come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, to the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and will cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w tall|strong="H6967"\w* cedar \w trees|strong="H0730"\w* thereof, \add and\add* the \w choice|strong="H4004"\w* fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* thereof: and I will \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w lodgings|strong="H4411"\w* of his \w borders|strong="H7093"\w*, \add and into\add* the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of his \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.\f + \fr 19.23 \ft By: Heb. By the hand of\f*\f + \fr 19.23 \ft tall…: Heb. tallness, etc\f*\f + \fr 19.23 \ft of his Carmel: or, and his fruitful field\f*

I have \w digged|strong="H6979"\w* and \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and with the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of my \w feet|strong="H6471"\w* have I \w dried|strong="H2717"\w* up all the \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* of besieged \w places|strong="H4693"\w*.\f + \fr 19.24 \ft besieged: or, fenced\f*

Hast thou not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* long \w ago|strong="H7350"\w* \add how\add* I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* it, \add and\add* of \w ancient|strong="H6924"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w* that I have \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* it? now have I \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it to pass, that thou shouldest be to lay \w waste|strong="H7582"\w* \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add into\add* \w ruinous|strong="H5327"\w* \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w*.\f + \fr 19.25 \ft long…: or, how I have made it long ago, and formed it of ancient times? should I now bring it to be laid waste, and fenced cities to be ruinous heaps?\f*

Therefore their \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* were of \w small|strong="H7116"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w*, they were \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*; they were \add as\add* the \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \add as\add* the \w green|strong="H3419"\w* \w herb|strong="H1877"\w*, \add as\add* the \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* on the \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w*, and \add as corn\add* \w blasted|strong="H7711"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* it be grown \w up|strong="H7054"\w*.\f + \fr 19.26 \ft of small…: Heb. short of hand\f*

But I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w abode|strong="H3427"\w*, and thy going \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and thy coming \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and thy \w rage|strong="H7264"\w* against me.\f + \fr 19.27 \ft abode: or, sitting\f*

Because thy \w rage|strong="H7264"\w* against me and thy \w tumult|strong="H7600"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, therefore I will \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w hook|strong="H2397"\w* in thy \w nose|strong="H0639"\w*, and my \w bridle|strong="H4964"\w* in thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, and I will turn thee \w back|strong="H7725"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* by which thou \w camest|strong="H0935"\w*.

And this \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto thee, Ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* this \w year|strong="H8141"\w* such things as \w grow|strong="H5599"\w* of themselves, and in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* that which \w springeth|strong="H7823"\w* of the same; and in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* ye, and \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*, and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* thereof.

And the \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* that is \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* take \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w downward|strong="H4295"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*.\f + \fr 19.30 \ft remnant…: Heb. escaping of the house of Judah that remaineth\f*

For out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w*, and they that \w escape|strong="H6413"\w* out of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: the \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add  \+w of hosts|strong="H6635"\+w*\add* shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this.\f + \fr 19.31 \ft they…: Heb. the escaping\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, He shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, nor \w shoot|strong="H3384"\w* an \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* there, nor come \w before|strong="H6923"\w* it with \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*, nor \w cast|strong="H8210"\w* a \w bank|strong="H5550"\w* against it.

By the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, by the same shall he \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
For I will \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* it, for mine own sake, and for my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* sake.

¶ And it came to pass that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Assyrians|strong="H0804"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*: and when they arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, behold, they \add were\add* all \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w corpses|strong="H6297"\w*.

So \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w departed|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*.

And it came to pass, as he was \w worshipping|strong="H7812"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Nisroch|strong="H5268"\w* his \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, that \w Adrammelech|strong="H0152"\w* and \w Sharezer|strong="H8272"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: and they \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Armenia|strong="H0780"\w*. And \w Esar-haddon|strong="H0634"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 19.37 \ft Armenia: Heb. Ararat\f*
